description: Beautifully renovated end-unit townhome in Greentree Village! As an end unit, this home enjoys extra windows, abundant natural light, and added backyard space. Upgrades include new laminate flooring, a fully redesigned kitchen with modern appliances, a newer composite deck, refreshed bathrooms, custom-built shelving/closets/drawers, smart switches/outlets, and a new gas fireplace. Community amenities feature an indoor pool, gym, and party room. Steps to Greentree Village Park/Playground, Deer Lake trails, and BCIT. Minutes to Burnaby Hospital, Christine Sinclair Community Centre, Metrotown, and The Amazing Brentwood. School catchments: Gilpin Elementary (English), Inman, Cascade Heights & Marlborough (French), and Moscrop Secondary (both).
